page.title: 04Findern school
page.content: {Findern school}was built on {Buckford {Lane}in{1925}so that it could be shared with the villages of{Stenson and{Twyford.}Today people in the village are worried about how far the school is from the village. There are plans that propose that a {motorway}will be built through the village or more likely will pass between the village and the school.The parents are concerned that it will be dangerous for their children to walk to school because they will have to walk past the motorway.The children could easily be knocked down by the traffic. Parents are very worried, but there are no plans to build a new school nearer to the the population.
